OTV.Title: Overlap Token Viewer
OTV.ListPopup.Title: Overlapping Tokens
OTV.ListPopup.NoTokens: No overlapping tokens at this location.
OTV.Notification.ListKeyHint: Hover over stacked tokens and press [{key}] to open the token list.
OTV.Settings.ListKey.Name: Token List Shortcut Key
OTV.Settings.ListKey.Hint: The keyboard shortcut to open the overlapping token list when hovering over stacked tokens.
OTV.Settings.MinOverlap.Name: Minimum Overlap Count
OTV.Settings.MinOverlap.Hint: The minimum number of tokens in a cell before the pie-chart display activates. Default: 2.
OTV.Settings.Enabled.Name: Enable Module
OTV.Settings.Enabled.Hint: Toggle the overlap token viewer on or off.
